sentence: Committee Vice Chair Liz Cheney, a Wyoming Republican, revealed that there was "firsthand" testimony that Trump's daughter Ivanka, then a White House official, twice asked her father to call off the rioters.
author: Stephen Collinson
title: Call for Pence cooperation shows ambition of January 6 panel ahead of anniversary

sentence: (Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) claims she is playing that role.)
author: Joel B. Pollak
title: January 6 Committee Subpoenas Phone Records of Eric Trump, Kimberly Guilfoyle; Trump Lawyers, Too
